title: En-hakkore
html: EN-HAKKORE(En-hak·korʹe) [Fountain (or, Spring) of the One Calling].A spring at Lehi. (Jg 15:19) It received its name when Samson, who was thirsty after he had struck down a thousand men, “began to call on Jehovah” for water and the spring was miraculously provided.—Jg 15:14-18.
